excerpt: A flavorful vegan version of the classic chickpea curry.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, and ginger and saut√© until onion is soft.
Add curry powder and cumin and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add chickpeas, coconut milk, and tomatoes and stir well.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 20-25 minutes.
Serve hot over rice or with naan bread.
